title: The Water trolley (K)
creator_credit: Nine Network, Penny Spence and Noel Price
brief_description: When young Paul’s father is badly hurt in an explosion, his mother calls in the Flying Doctor Service and Paul is left to care for the farm. His immediate concern is to fetch water from a nearby property - a task that becomes fraught with difficulties. Based on a story by Colin Thiele.
